Articles.Content: After i verified integrity of my ksp file on steam & then copied everything to a new folder under C:/users/me/kerbal space program would this work as a working folder that i can then mod while not tampering with original game file?

Yes. The only thing that I'm not 100% sure of (I'm 99.9% sure though) is that I'd never use spaces in directory names. Windows supports spaces in directory and file names the way gas stations support the selling of egg-salad sandwiches. Sure they're present, but I wouldn't touch one.

But I've been copying my Steam install into different directories for years. Probably 2 dozen or more installs. The only problems I've ever had were when I failed to copy everything for random reasons.

Edited September 13, 2020 by Superfluous J
